alert.note: Alert for East Baton Rouge; East Feliciana; West Baton Rouge (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 11 at 3:26PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern West Baton Rouge, southwestern East Feliciana and northwestern East Baton Rouge Parishes through 400 PM CDT... At 326 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Zachary, moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Baton Rouge, Zachary, Baker, Slaughter, Merrydale, Brownfields, Greenwell Spring and Baton Rouge Airport. This includes Interstate 110 in Louisiana between mile markers 5 and 8. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: East Baton Rouge; East Feliciana; West Baton Rouge
